trans-unit.source: Represents a single user interface (UI) entity managed by an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示單一使用者介面 (UI) 實體受<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The sole purpose of a Glyph is to paint and hit test.
trans-unit.target: 字符的唯一目的是繪製和點擊測試。

trans-unit.source: A Glyph does not have a window handle (HWND), as it is rendered on the adorner window control of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: 字符沒有視窗控制代碼 (HWND)，它所呈現的樣式的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>裝飾項視窗控制項上

trans-unit.source: Each Glyph can have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 每個字符可以有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>與其關聯。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: A successfully hit-tested Glyph has the opportunity to push a new or different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> onto the behavior stack of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: 成功的點擊測試的圖像有機會推送新的或不同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>行為堆疊</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[行為服務概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref>聯<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref>聯<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no behavior.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref>聯<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref>，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果沒有任何行為。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得的界限<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>表示的範圍<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Provides hit test logic.
trans-unit.target: 提供叫用的測試邏輯。

trans-unit.source: The GetHitTest method is an `abstract` method that forces <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> implementations to provide hit test logic.
trans-unit.target: GetHitTest 方法`abstract`方法強制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>實作提供點擊的測試邏輯。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: Given any point, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> has decided to be involved with that location, it will need to return a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor>.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定任何時間點，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>決定會涉及的位置，它都必須傳回有效的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, returning `null` will cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> to ignore the location.
trans-unit.target: 否則，傳回`null`會導致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>要略過的位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: A point to hit-test.
trans-unit.target: 要點擊測試的點。

trans-unit.source: A if the is associated with p; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: A if the is associated with p; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Provides paint logic.
trans-unit.target: 提供繪製邏輯。

trans-unit.source: The Paint method is an `abstract` method that forces <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> implementations to provide paint logic.
trans-unit.target: 小畫家方法`abstract`方法強制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>實作提供繪製邏輯。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: The `pe` parameter contains the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> related to the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: `pe`參數會包含<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>相關的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>裝飾項視窗</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Changes the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 變更<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref>聯<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> to associate with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref>關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref>。
